item.title: IDT CORP 10-K
item.description: IDT CORP, which is in the Telephone Communications (No Radio Telephone) [4813] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 14, 2022 had 41982 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 444 instances fiscal - 404 instances 2022 - 379 instances million - 328 instances services - 314 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
